languages.text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.
languages.original_text: Действует только на союзников, которые могут приблизиться к {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицеру{/g}, преодолев не более 20 клеток. Заставляет союзника немедленно переместиться к офицеру по кратчайшему возможному маршруту. Если на союзника при этом действует Приказ командира, он получает +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} офицера. Пока союзник под действием эффекта Быстро сюда! остается на соседней клетке с офицером, любая атака, направленная в офицера, вместо этого попадает в союзника.

traits.locale_text: This ability can only be used on allies who can reach the Leader by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Leader immediately makes an ally move toward the Leader by taking the shortest possible path.{br} If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +2×(Leader's WP bonus)% armour until the end of the Leader's turn. If the target remains adjacent to the Leader, any attacks made against the Leader will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

This ability can only be used on allies who can reach the Leader by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Leader immediately makes an ally move toward the Leader by taking the shortest possible path.{br} If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +(2 × Leader's WP bonus)% armour until the end of the Leader's turn. If the target remains adjacent to the Leader, any attacks made against the Leader will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the Leader by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Leader immediately makes an ally move toward the Leader by taking the shortest possible path.{br} If the target is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Leader's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Leader, any attacks made against the Leader will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

languages.text: Действует только на союзников, которые могут приблизиться к {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицеру{/g}, преодолев не более 20 клеток. Заставляет союзника немедленно переместиться к офицеру по кратчайшему возможному маршруту. Если на союзника при этом действует Приказ командира, он получает +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} офицера. Пока союзник под действием эффекта Быстро сюда! остается на соседней клетке с офицером, любая атака, направленная в офицера, вместо этого попадает в союзника.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

traits.locale_text: Действует только на союзников, которые могут приблизиться к лидеру, преодолев не более 20 клеток. Заставляет союзника немедленно переместиться к лидеру по кратчайшему возможному маршруту.{br} Если на союзника при этом действует Приказ командира, он получает +(2 × бонус ВОЛ лидера)% брони до конца хода лидера. Пока союзник под действием эффекта Быстро сюда! остается на соседней клетке с лидером, любая атака, направленная в лидера, вместо этого попадает в союзника.

Действует только на союзников, которые могут приблизиться к лидеру, преодолев не более 20 клеток. Заставляет союзника немедленно переместиться к лидеру по кратчайшему возможному маршруту.{br} Если на союзника при этом действует Приказ командира, он получает +(2 × бонус ВОЛ лидера)% брони до конца хода лидера. Пока союзник под действием эффекта Быстро сюда! остается на соседней клетке с лидером, любая атака, направленная в лидера, вместо этого попадает в союзника.

Действует только на союзников, которые могут приблизиться к лидеру, преодолев не более 20 клеток. Заставляет союзника немедленно переместиться к лидеру по кратчайшему возможному маршруту.{br} Если на союзника при этом действует Приказ командира, он получает +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} лидера. Пока союзник под действием эффекта Быстро сюда! остается на соседней клетке с лидером, любая атака, направленная в лидера, вместо этого попадает в союзника.

languages.text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能用在离{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}不超过20格的盟友身上。军官会让该盟友立即以最短的路径朝军官的方向移动。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}%，直到军官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。如果该盟友移动到了军官身边，则所有针对军官的攻击，都会由该盟友承担，直到来我身边！的效果结束。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

traits.locale_text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能用在离领袖不超过20格的盟友身上。领袖会让该盟友立即以最短的路径朝领袖的方向移动。{br} 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高（2×领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%，直到领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。如果该盟友移动到了领袖身边，则所有针对领袖的攻击，都会由该盟友承担，直到来我身边！的效果结束。

此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能用在离领袖不超过20格的盟友身上。领袖会让该盟友立即以最短的路径朝领袖的方向移动。{br} 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，则该盟友{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}%，直到领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。如果该盟友移动到了领袖身边，则所有针对领袖的攻击，都会由该盟友承担，直到来我身边！的效果结束。

languages.text: Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo puede utilizarse sobre aliados que puedan llegar hasta el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} recorriendo menos de 20 casillas. El oficial obliga inmediatamente a un aliado a moverse hacia él por el camino más corto posible. Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, gana un +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial. Si el objetivo permanece adyacente al oficial, todo ataque efectuado contra este se dirigirá contra el objetivo en su lugar hasta que finalice el efecto de ¡A mí!.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

traits.locale_text: Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo puede utilizarse sobre aliados que puedan llegar hasta el oficial recorriendo menos de 20 casillas. El oficial obliga inmediatamente a un aliado a moverse hacia él por el camino más corto posible.{br} Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, gana un +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial. Si el objetivo permanece adyacente al oficial, todo ataque efectuado contra este se dirigirá contra el objetivo en su lugar hasta que finalice el efecto de ¡A mí!.

Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo puede utilizarse sobre aliados que puedan llegar hasta el líder recorriendo menos de 20 casillas. El líder obliga inmediatamente a un aliado a moverse hacia él por el camino más corto posible.{br} Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, gana un +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del líder. Si el objetivo permanece adyacente al líder, todo ataque efectuado contra este se dirigirá contra el objetivo en su lugar hasta que finalice el efecto de ¡A mí!.

languages.text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur bei Verbündeten eingesetzt werden, die den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} durch eine Bewegung von weniger als 20 Feldern erreichen können. Der Offizier lässt einen Verbündeten sofort auf dem kürzesten Weg zum Offizier kommen. Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, erhält es +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers. Bleibt das Ziel neben dem Offizier, richten sich alle Angriffe gegen den Offizier stattdessen gegen das Ziel, bis der Effekt von Zu mir! endet.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

traits.locale_text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur bei Verbündeten eingesetzt werden, die den Offizier durch eine Bewegung von weniger als 20 Feldern erreichen können. Der Offizier lässt einen Verbündeten sofort auf dem kürzesten Weg zum Offizier kommen.{br} Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, erhält es +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Offiziers. Bleibt das Ziel neben dem Offizier, richten sich alle Angriffe gegen den Offizier stattdessen gegen das Ziel, bis der Effekt von Zu mir! endet.

Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur bei Verbündeten eingesetzt werden, die den Anführer durch eine Bewegung von weniger als 20 Feldern erreichen können. Der Anführer lässt einen Verbündeten sofort auf dem kürzesten Weg zum Anführer kommen.{br} Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, erhält es +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Anführers. Bleibt das Ziel in der Nähe des Anführers, richten sich alle Angriffe gegen den Anführer stattdessen gegen das Ziel, bis der Effekt von Zu mir! endet.

languages.text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés capables d'atteindre l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} en se déplaçant de moins de 20 cases. L'officier ordonne immédiatement à un allié de le rejoindre en empruntant le chemin le plus court. Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du commandement, elle bénéficie de +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'officier. Si la cible est adjacente à l'officier, toutes les attaques menées contre celui-ci la visent jusqu'à ce que l'effet Cri de ralliement se dissipe.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

traits.locale_text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés capables d'atteindre le Leader en se déplaçant de moins de 20 cases. Le Leader ordonne immédiatement à un allié de le rejoindre en empruntant le chemin le plus court.{br} Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle bénéficie de +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} du Leader) % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Leader. Si la cible est adjacente au Leader, toutes les attaques menées contre celui-ci la visent jusqu'à ce que l'effet d'À moi ! se dissipe.

Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés capables d'atteindre le Leader en se déplaçant de moins de 20 cases. Le Leader ordonne immédiatement à un allié de le rejoindre en empruntant le chemin le plus court.{br} Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle bénéficie de +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Leader. Si la cible est adjacente au Leader, toutes les attaques menées contre celui-ci la visent jusqu'à ce que l'effet d'À moi ! se dissipe.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はオフィサーまで20セル以内で移動できる味方にのみ使用できる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}は即座にその味方を、最短経路でオフィサーのもとまで移動させる。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、オフィサーの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}%される。ターゲットがオフィサーに隣接したままの場合、我もとへ！の効果が終了するまで、オフィサーに対する攻撃はターゲットが代わりに受ける。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はリーダーまで20セル以内で移動できる味方にのみ使用できる。リーダーは即座にその味方を、最短経路でリーダーのもとまで移動させる。{br} ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、リーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+(2 × リーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})%される。ターゲットがリーダーに隣接したままの場合、我もとへ！の効果が終了するまで、リーダーに対する攻撃はターゲットが代わりに受ける。

この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}はリーダーまで20セル以内で移動できる味方にのみ使用できる。リーダーは即座にその味方を、最短経路でリーダーのもとまで移動させる。{br} ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、リーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}%される。ターゲットがリーダーに隣接したままの場合、我もとへ！の効果が終了するまで、リーダーに対する攻撃はターゲットが代わりに受ける。

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, sadece {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay'a{/g} 20 hücreden fazla ilerlemesine gerek kalmadan yaklaşabilen dost birimlerde kullanılabilir. Subay, bir dost birimin mümkün olan en kısa yoldan kendisine doğru hemen ilerlemesini sağlar. Hedef, Emir Sözü kabiliyetinin etkisi altındaysa %{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Hedef, Subay'ın bitişiğinde kalmaya devam ederse Subay'a yapılan her türlü saldırı, Toplan! etkisi bitene dek Subay yerine onu hedef alır.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used on allies who can reach the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} by moving fewer than 20 cells. The Officer immediately makes an ally move toward the Officer by taking the shortest possible path. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +{uip|ArmourBonus|19b029e81dae4e418fddfc6d24af3f6a}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the target remains adjacent to the Officer, any attacks made against the Officer will target them instead until the effect of To Me! ends.
